item.title: Mezlan Casanova
item.dc:creator: John Smith
item.description: Six-eyelet cap-toe balmoral. Full leather linings. Single oak leather sole. Custom heel. This style tends to run narrow. For an accurate fit we recommend purchasing a 1/2 size larger than you typically purchase. For example, if you normally purchase a size 7, we recommend purchasing a size 7 1/2.
item.content:encoded:
Six-eyelet cap-toe balmoral. Full leather linings. Single oak leather sole. Custom heel.

This style tends to run narrow. For an accurate fit we recommend purchasing a 1/2 size larger than you typically purchase. For example, if you normally purchase a size 7, we recommend purchasing a size 7 1/2.

item.title: Tough Jacket
item.dc:creator: John Smith
item.description: Down-filled puffer jacket, featuring two front hand pockets, outer chest pocket and three inner pockets. Removable hood. Water-resistant. This is our warmest winter jacket.
item.content:encoded: Down-filled puffer jacket, featuring two front hand pockets, outer chest pocket and three inner pockets. Removable hood. Water-resistant. This is our warmest winter jacket.
